channel.title: Yanka Dyagileva on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Yanka Dyagileva on Rusland 1

item.title: Yanka Dyagileva
item.description: She was never able to record anything with professional sound quality, but somehow, her music doesn’t seem to suffer for it—in fact, it almost seems like it was made for this rawness. It was difficult to choose just three tracks, so there are seven.
